alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Jones; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 10:36AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with very heavy rain will impact portions of Baldwin, northwestern Wilkinson, southern Hancock, Glascock, northwestern Washington and southeastern Jones Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1036 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms with very heavy rain was along a line extending from Beulah to near Cross Keys, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rain may cause temporary minor flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Gray, Gibson, Gordon, Ivey, Mitchell, Deepstep, Edge Hill, Midway-Hardwick, Edgehill, Hamburg State Park, Shoals, Postell, Beulah, Allenwood, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Agricola, Hardwick and Browns Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Electrical appliances should not be used unless in an emergency. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EDT for central and east central Georgia. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EDT for east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Jones; Washington; Wilkinson
